heist_join_time.label: Time to join heist (seconds)
heist_join_time.tooltip: How long chat has to join the heist before the heist starts.

heist_cooldown.label: Time for heist to refresh (seconds)
heist_cooldown.tooltip: How long after a heist before chat can heist again.

heist_payout.label: Payout
heist_payout.tooltip: The total payout of the heist will be the in put of the viewers times this value.

heist_user_limit.label: Heist user limit
heist_user_limit.tooltip: The maximum amount of viewers that can enter the heist.

fish_minimum_value.label: Minimum fish payout (channel points)
fish_minimum_value.tooltip: The minimum amount of points a viewer can get for catching a fish.

fish_maximum_value.label: Maximum fish payout (channel points)
fish_maximum_value.tooltip: The maximum amount of points a viewer can get for catching a fish.

fish_catch_chance.label: Catch Chance ( % )
fish_catch_chance.tooltip: The percentage chance a user has of catching a fish during the event.

fish_permission.label: Start/stop event.
fish_permission.tooltip: The users that can start and stop the fish events.

points_per_message.label: Points per message
points_per_message.tooltip: The amount of points a viewer gets on sending a chat message.

tick_refresh_rate.label: Tick function refresh rate (seconds)
tick_refresh_rate.tooltip: Set this higher to ease burden of heist on CPU, lower increases CPU burden but faster response time.
